com.hula.web.velocity

Class Decorate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.velocity.runtime.directive.Directive
      • org.apache.velocity.runtime.directive.InputBase
        • org.apache.velocity.runtime.directive.Parse
          • com.hula.web.velocity.Decorate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, org.apache.velocity.runtime.directive.DirectiveConstants

    public class Decorate
extends org.apache.velocity.runtime.directive.Parse
    Custom Velocity directive to specify that a block of content should be decorated.

    Example usage: The velocity page specifies a separate template for the layout
     #decorate("layout.vm")
    <h1>Page Title</h1>
 #end
    The layout template replaces $body_content with the decorated content: 
     <html>
    <body>
       $body_content
    </body>
 </html>
